By the time our waitress Lea came up to greet us we had already looked over the entire menu & knew what we wanted for apps & entrees (so we waited about 10 minutes before a greet). She asked us what we wanted to drink and walked away mid sentence without offering appetizers or asking if we knew what we wanted.  She comes back with our drinks & asks if we want an appetizer. We let her know we're ready to order our entrees as well. Some time later our entrees come..no appetizer. Lea never comes to ask if our food is okay...we had to wave her down & she approaches our table suddenly wearing lipstick (: (so she had time to apply make up yet she forgets to ring up our app). She asks us if we still want the app, we say yes. We then hear a manger lecture her about her mistake for a few minutes instead of resolving the problem or approaching us to apologize. We finish our entrees, waited another 10 minutes and the appetizers come out. My bf's cup was empty for the next 4 times she walked right by it without offering him a refill. We finish the apps and wait what felt like 30 minutes before she comes up and asked if we wanted dessert. We decline & asked for the check. She drops the check, we notice she charged us for the appetizer, & adds insult to injury by circling the suggested tip with a smiley face....my bf had barely taken his wallet out of his pocket when she returned to pick up the payment.  Worst service I've had in a long time.

I was extremely disappointed in the cheeseburger I ordered which was cooked well done instead of the medium rare I ordered. The pot stickers were also way overcooked to being crispy and not in a good way. The only reason I gave it 2 stars was the service was pretty good. The server would have replaced the burger but I was in a hurry which was ironic since I had to wait longer for the overcooking

A ROACH crawling on table.... see photo .... this place sucks... visiting from Los Angeles.... service was slow, employees were nonchalant & lacked customer service skills,  food was cold, drinks watered down and the worse part is there was a roach crawling on my table. When I called the manager he simply picked up the roach and said "we just fumigated, I'll take care of your bill".... Bill??? What bill???? I didn't even eat the food. ..... I just walked out... ugh!!!!

Food is ok... Nothing unique  Waiter was VERY friendly The floor was very dirty and there was fries everywhere!!  The place was remodeled and it looks better than the previous look, love the bar as it have a nice display of every alcohol they offer. The plates where upgraded too, no more plastic basket bags for the fries and it's now very elegant so kudos for you guys

I had the turkey burger, the bread was dry and hard, like it was old and they had to get rid of it quick.   My friend ordered a beer and the beer was delivered room temperature!!! Then my friend decided to order pasta and add chicken to it, when the meal came it not only did it NOT have chicken but the Manager a short man with glasses came back to us with an attitude trying to start an argument with us! The nerve of that guy! Poor food and poor customer service!!!

I was here last night with my friend and when I ordered an alcoholic beverage the waitress refused to serve me one because of my "vertical" ID. I understand how it could've been a fake, but don't fucking lie to my face and tell me it's because of some lawsuit filed against the restaurant. When my friend asked to speak to the "manager" he was like 16.

After a long evening of shopping I managed to stop by here since it didn't seem packed like the other restaurants. Big mistake. Upon walking in the hostess tries to seat me at the bar, yet the area wasn't even clean. Since I told her I had bags in my hand I got to sit at a booth. Took about five minutes for the server Tito to come, and when he did, I ordered the bourbon barrel chicken with Mac n cheese and broccoli. The chicken was so small for a boneless breast, it was smaller than my fist. The Mac n cheese wasn't too tasty and it was more of Mac than cheese. I was more annoyed with the high school kids sitting behind me who were so loud, I wanted to get out of there so bad. There are other restaurants to choose from.

My rate is too high. The service in this place is crap. Overpriced, not good taste. I ordered a cheeseburger, 45 minutes later wasn't done. Talked with the manager, didn't do nothing. if he doesn't care about this place, who would? I'll never return.

The great thing about FGI Friday in dolphin mall is that it stays open till late . I hate the fact that everything else except mojitos is close if you want to grab a bite . The couple times I've been to this location the service has been great . The girls have been attentive and on point always smiling .

More like a 3.5.  Friday's is a great option for a quick bite and drinks. They have great daily happy hour specials, which includes some of their appetizers.  The food is tasty, but greasy, as you can expect from your typical chain restaurant. For me, it has never been a bad last minute decision, and the menu offers something for everyone.

We dined in on a monday afternoon, & it was a nice service. The waiter was very attentive, with our refills & any other requests we brought up. The food came quickly & was warm, tasty, satisfying. The place is clean, well organized & kid friendly. They have good drink specials also. I would visit again.
Always a great place for a quick bite, happy hour with friends or just a nice  dinner out. Newly remodeled!!! Friendly & fast service.

Won't be back, ever! Terrible customer service. Was ignored from the beginning- finally got the bartenders attention, once I got up from the table! I never received my order only half of it and was unaware of last call when the server never came back to bring my food or check to see if we wanted our last round. The manager gave us our tab taking off the item we did not receive (obviously) however, did not make up for the poor service. At my restaurant the management would have made up for the lousy service and tried everything to keep us as a customer. The bartender nor manager could have cared less. I will never step foot in this establishment again, at dolphin mall there are many choices and on this day I made a bad one by coming here on my day off. I never complain as being in the biz however when I receive HORRIBLE service it really pisses me off as I ensure excellent service to my patrons. Negative stars if possible.

Worst experience I have ever had at a TGI Fridays. I was a part of a group of 4 who all had issues with our meals. They brought cold food for half of our table and the WRONG food for the other half. Our waitress was extremely slow and put our orders in wrong. When she brought out the correct side dish, it was literally swimming in butter to the point where I had to pour it out into an empty water glass. The manager could see how disappointed we were with our food and made sure not to stop at our table as he was making his rounds through the restaurant. I will never be returning to this location and I suggest you visit Brother Jimmy's a few feet away. APPLEBEE'S 4 LIFE

They offer happy hour for well drinks for $3 and call drinks for $5 then when the bill comes is for $10 each.  They rob you blind, the manager Robert doesn't even know the difference a call drink and a well drink.

This was my first time ever going to TGI Friday's. MY husband has been multiple times. We showed up late after work on a Wednesday night and were seated immediately. Always a good start :)  Our server was very quick and brought our drinks (water) right away. We were ready to order just a few minutes after sitting down and she was ready to go. My husband ordered the chicken and shrimp sizzler with twice baked mashed potatoes, and I had the steak + spinach sizzler (with squash and a caprese salad). We also ordered side salads, which came out quickly.... which was great because we were so hungry! Right as we were finishing our salads, our entreés were ready. As you can see, I was impressed with the speediness! The place was fairly empty, but in my experience of late night eating that can sometimes mean extremely slow service. Not in this case :) So our food was pretty good! Nothing crazy and spectacular, but still good for this type of restaurant.  I was, however, surprised by the prices of this place (being my first time there). I was shocked to see almost every entree/burger/dish was over $10! I guess I was expecting Friday's to be a Applebee's/Chili's kinda place, which I still believe to be true, but to at least have similar prices? I don't know. In conclusion, we give a 3 for good food, 5 for awesome, prompt service... bringing the total to 4 stars.
